text: Laura Elizabeth Tobin (born 10 October 1981) is an English broadcast meteorologist for the Met Office on Good Morning Britain. Tobin worked for the BBC before joining the ITV breakfast show Daybreak in 2012. Daybreak was later replaced by Good Morning Britain in April 2014. ==Early life and education== Tobin was born and raised in Northampton. She attended Duston Upper School, earned A-levels in Mathematics, Physics and Art and then earned a degree in Physics and Meteorology from the University of Reading. She also completed a World Meteorological Organization course on climate. Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:British meteorologists
title: Laura Tobin
